title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin dissects an Instagram post from Aaron Rodgers expressing gratitude and why Rodgers is starting to remind him of another all time great QB late in his career. He points out the one thing Michael Jordan has over LeBron James that is not even disputable. He believes Tom Brady will remain retired despite the rumors about him making a comeback. Plus, Buccaneers insider Rick Stroud joins the show to dispel the report about a rift between Brady and his former head coach Bruce Arians. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
